value.title: Secure your apps by using the sidecar configuration in Azure Container Instances
value.excerpt: Roll out Azure Container Instances into an Azure Virtual Network. You will evolve a basic container group into a more sophisticated configuration leveraging sidecar and initialization containers, as well as use private link to access other Azure PaaS resources.

value.title: Implement Azure App Service on Kubernetes with Arc
value.excerpt: Azure App Service on Kubernetes with Azure Arc enables implementation of Azure application-platform services on customer-managed, Arc-onboarded Kubernetes clusters. Azure App Service is one you can implement.

value.title: Create and manage Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Azure Cognitive Services enable developers to easily add cognitive features into their applications. Learn how to configure and manage these services for your AI application needs.

value.title: Build a Web App with Refreshable Machine Learning Models
value.excerpt: Build a web app powered by machine learning models trained using Custom Vision AI service, and learn how to refresh them with GitHub Actions.

value.title: Design for performance and scalability in Azure
value.excerpt: Scaling your system to handle load, identifying network bottlenecks, and optimizing your storage performance are important to ensure your users have the best experience. Learn how to make your application perform at its best.

images.title: Design for performance and scalability in Azure
Design for performance and scalability in Azure

value.title: Gather metrics from your Azure Blob Storage containers
value.excerpt: Find out how to use Azure Storage Analytics to track the performance of your Blob storage containers and to display that Blob performance in your dashboard.

value.title: Innovate applications with Azure cloud technologies.
value.excerpt: Innovation is a complex topic that encompasses many disciplines. The agility of public cloud allows to quicker innovation cycles and quicker hypothesis verification. Learn how to use Azure cloud technologies to sustain your organization's innovation requirements.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes
value.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes

value.title: Introduction to Elastic on Azure
value.excerpt: Evaluate whether Elastic on Azure is appropriate for your Linux workload.

value.title: Investigate container for use with Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: Learn about Container support in Cognitive Services allowing the use of APIs available in Azure and enable flexibility in where to deploy and host the services with Docker containers.

value.title: Choose an Azure service for deploying your Java application
value.excerpt: In this tutorial, you'll learn about running your Java applications on Azure, and choose the best option between Virtual Machines, Azure App Services, Serverless functions, Kubernetes and Azure Spring Cloud.

value.title: Manage Azure Kubernetes Service on Azure Stack HCI
value.excerpt: Manage Azure Kubernetes Service on Azure Stack HCI

value.title: Create and deploy a cloud-native ASP.NET Core microservice
value.excerpt: This module guides you through containerizing an ASP.NET Core microservice and deploying it to Azure Kubernetes Service.

value.title: Implement feature flags in a cloud-native ASP.NET Core microservices app
value.excerpt: This module guides you through implementing a feature flag in an ASP.NET Core microservices app using Azure App Configuration.

value.title: Use managed data stores in a cloud-native ASP.NET Core microservices app
value.excerpt: This module guides you through implementing Azure-managed data stores in an ASP.NET Core microservices app.

value.title: Instrument a cloud-native ASP.NET Core microservice
value.excerpt: This module guides you through implementing logging and monitoring in an ASP.NET Core microservices app in Azure Kubernetes Service.

value.title: Implement resiliency in a cloud-native ASP.NET Core microservice
value.excerpt: This module guides you through implementing resiliency in an ASP.NET Core microservices app in Azure Kubernetes Service.

value.title: 5 Things you didn't know about Azure Kubernetes Service | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn about 5 things you didn't know about Azure Kubernetes Service.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure:

value.excerpt: Curious about what's coming for container lifecycle management in Azure? To help you plan your roadmap, Steve Lasker and Scott Hanselman talk about the Azure Container Registry (ACR) roadmap, including updates for production security, reliability features, and developer security. value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Container Registry Geo-replication
value.excerpt: Steve Lasker joins Donovan Brown to explain Azure Container Registry (ACR) Geo-replication. With ACR, you can now manage your global Azure footprint as one resource, enabling network-close deployments of your Docker containers. With regionalized WebHooks, you can deploy regions as your images arrive.

value.title: Azure Friday | Jenkins Plugins for Kubernetes
value.excerpt: Pui Chee "PC" Chan joins Scott Hanselman to discuss native support for Jenkins in Azure. Our plugins make it easy for you to build your project using a container agent and then automate deployment from Jenkins to an Azure Container Service Kubernetes cluster.
